titles: Moriemini. A verie profitable sermon preached before her Maiestie at the court, about xiij. yeares since: by H.B.
author: H. B., fl. 1593.
Broughton, Hugh, 1549-1612, attributed name.
publisher: Printed [R. Field for] by Iohn VVolfe,
notes: The New College (University of Oxford) Library copy is ascribed to Hugh Broughton in an early 17th-century hand--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
